languages.text: {n}Все за столом сбрасывают плитки вслед за вами. Разочарованно пожав плечами, Джай произносит:{/n} "Какие вы все осторожные. Неужели никто из вас не умеет танцевать?"
{n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"
languages.original_text: {n}Все за столом сбрасывают плитки вслед за вами. Разочарованно пожав плечами, Джай произносит:{/n} "Какие вы все осторожные. Неужели никто из вас не умеет танцевать?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"
{n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"
{n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"
{n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

languages.text: {n}在你之后，所有人都把手里的牌弃掉了。婕伊失望地耸了耸肩。{/n}“你们实在是太谨慎了，莫非你们全都不会跳舞吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}在你之后，所有人都把手里的牌弃掉了。婕伊失望地耸了耸肩。{/n}“你们实在是太谨慎了，莫非你们全都不会跳舞吗？”

languages.text: {n}誰もがあなたの後にタイルを捨てる。ジェイは、がっかりしたように肩をすくめながら言う。{/n}「みんな用心深いね。誰も踊り方を知らないの？」
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}誰もがあなたの後にタイルを捨てる。ジェイは、がっかりしたように肩をすくめながら言う。{/n}「みんな用心深いね。誰も踊り方を知らないの？」

languages.text: {n}Después de ti, todos descartan sus fichas. Jae, decepcionada, se encoge de hombros y dice{/n} «Cuánta precaución. ¿Es que nadie sabe bailar?».
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de ti, todos descartan sus fichas. Jae, decepcionada, se encoge de hombros y dice{/n} «Cuánta precaución. ¿Es que nadie sabe bailar?».

languages.text: {n}Tout le monde jette ses tuiles à votre suite. Déçue, Jae hausse les épaules et annonce :{/n} « Vous êtes tous tellement prudents. Vous ne savez donc pas danser ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout le monde jette ses tuiles à votre suite. Déçue, Jae hausse les épaules et annonce :{/n} « Vous êtes tous tellement prudents. Vous ne savez donc pas danser ? »

languages.text: {n}Nach dir legt auch der Rest seine Steine ab. Mit einem enttäuschten Schulterzucken sagt Jae:{/n} "Ihr seid alle so vorsichtig. Kann denn hier keiner tanzen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach dir legt auch der Rest seine Steine ab. Mit einem enttäuschten Schulterzucken sagt Jae:{/n} "Ihr seid alle so vorsichtig. Kann denn hier keiner tanzen?"

languages.text: {n}Senden sonra diğerleri de karolarını bırakıyor. Jae, hayal kırıklığıyla omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Fazla temkinlisiniz. Aranızda dans etmeyi bilen kimse mi yok?"
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone discards their tiles after you. With a disappointed shrug, Jae says,{/n} "You're all so cautious. Do none of you know how to dance?"
